parties2

parties2.Rd

parties2

cowcode

Country code (from Correlates of War Project).

ccode

Country code (International Standards Organization, Alpha-3 code)

year

Year

legis

Legislature in operation?

newleg

New legislature

date_h

House election date

date_s

Senate election date

p_h

President's share (house)

p_s

President's share (senate)

g_h

Government's share (house)

g_s

Government's share (senate)

coalition

Legislative coalition

enph

Effective number of parties (House)

enps

Effective number of parties (Senate)

data(parties2)

Format

A data frame with 1995 rows and 14 variables

References

@references Aníbal Pérez-Liñan and Nicolás Schmidt and Daniela Vairo (2023), Partidos legislativos y coaliciones políticas en América Latina (1925-2019), Politica y Gibierno, Volumen XXX, Número 2.
